Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Kathy L. Scholl "Katlyn100"
Reviews.Content: I've bought 6 Kindles, starting with the very first generation -- I have three Kindle Fires and love this one the best.  I got a 32GB this time because I ran out of app space on my 16GB.  I also got one for my granddaughter.  This model boots up faster than the others and is so light, even when in a case, that I hardly notice it's in my purse.  I couldn't live without it!

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Woodsman
Reviews.Content: Bought two and pleased with them.  Wife and granddaughter each have one and they absolutely love them.  Bought without annoying popups or ads.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Sandra Hatcher
Reviews.Content: This is my first e-reader/tablet.  I've found the Fire HDX to be very easy to understand and use.  I ordered the 32 gb so I could load my music and book library and still have room for apps and movies.  Even with everything loaded, I still have a lot of room and the speed is still incredibly fast.  I've used the Mayday button a few times and have had excellent help from the CSRs that have answered.  Overall, I'm really happy with my purchase and would recommend this tablet to friends and family.

Reviews.Title: Don't know how I lived before Kindle
Reviews.Author: Ben
Reviews.Content: Amazing access to Amazon products, simple user interface and a great battery life. I love this thing to the end of the earth and back.

Reviews.Title: it is a wonderful and easy to use kindle
Reviews.Author: linda murchison
Reviews.Content: fabulous  and my friend purchased after she saw mine and she too is thrilled, i am  getting one for my mom

Reviews.Title: Kindle convert
Reviews.Author: Kim
Reviews.Content: The screen is illuminated beautifully. I also love the page layout. I have the same books on my mini-IPad and time and again Kindle has the pages that are easier on the eye. I love this device!

Reviews.Title: 3rd Kindle
Reviews.Author: David D. Shealor
Reviews.Content: I bought the original kindle and after a year or so it disappeared. I took that as an excuse to get the Kindle HD which was a large improvement. I read quite a few books and became ever so slightly addicted to a solitaire game. Eventually, I used that Kindle more than my PC. Then I got it into my head that I needed a 10.4 inch screen so I got one and after a day I was asking myself "why did I think this would be so great?" It was too big.So I returned it and got the 8.9 inch HDX for less than half the price. I really like this kindle. It is lighter than the HD and much faster to browse the internet. I suppose if you wanted to watch video on a tablet there would be reason to have a bigger screen but to read books and check bank balances etc the 8.9 inch HDX is perfect.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Sean Derek Brown
Reviews.Content: Great screen, easy to read, easy to use. It does exactly what I want the way that it want it to.

Reviews.Title: Great reader !!`
Reviews.Author: Sandra Pritt "bzygrl44"
Reviews.Content: Great reader.  Much improved back light, very easy to navigate between apps.  Love the added bonus of being able to read/ and listen to audible simultaneously.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet!
Reviews.Author: Rachel Groe
Reviews.Content: I bought this back in December (almost three months ago now) and have loved using it since! It works wonderfully, and my family loves using it to surf the web and play on applications (especially Netflix!). It is a very fast machine. I only wish it had a rear-camera for taking pictures, and a good Office-like app.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: Lin
Reviews.Content: Really like the HDX.  Had originally ordered the paperwhite but returned it.  Found it much harder to use.  I read a lot.  Had the HD for three years but wore it out.  Love not having to bother with books.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: LOURDES REROMA
Reviews.Content: This device is so handy.  Except for the front facing camera, this gadget is great.  I would have wanted a camera that could switch to the back.

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Betty Ryan
Reviews.Content: Met all my expectations! Connects instantly to Bookstore. Downloads quickly. It is my  third and favorite Kindle!Recommend it to everyone.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Estela
Reviews.Content: it helps a lot to many things you want to do with this small gadget especially when travelling. will recommend it to relatives and friends.

Reviews.Title: I bought a 7 and a 9"
Reviews.Author: Linda Sorensen
Reviews.Content: My wife loves her 7" HDX.  Does a lot with it but also still uses her kindle for reading till her books are finished that she has downloaded.I love mine but still haven't used some of the apps I put on the 9" HDX.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE HDX7
Reviews.Author: helen buzzell
Reviews.Content: Just love my kindle fire and really love using it especially with the book showing how to use the different chapters in My kindle fire handbook by Jim Cheshire & Jennifer Kettell.  This kindle stays on and does let me read like it should and I don't have any problems with it, only have a hard time putting it down because I love reading on it.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Beatriz "lanai girl"
Reviews.Content: This is my first Kindle and I am still learning all the features, but so far I really, really like it.  If you want more information, there is a wonderful, lengthy review that an expert reviewer wrote, look it up.

Reviews.Title: My new Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: William Todd
Reviews.Content: Still getting used to it, but I like it so far.  The only complaint I have is that it loses my page frequently when I put it down.

Reviews.Title: Great tablet - No issues
Reviews.Author: K. Mizell
Reviews.Content: I'm a casual user, mainly for Internet, news, e-mail, weather reports, games, and some other things of interest.I've had the tablet for 4 days now, and have found no problems at all.As for the reports of pages on the e-reader with the blue edges - If I hadn't read about it in reviews, I wouldn't have noticed it at all. It's barely there, and certainly not an issue.While I cannot go to the Google app store, I've had no problem finding what I need.  I found a nice Gmail app (Tab for Gmail) on the Amazon App Store. The Silk Internet browser works just fine.  I was able to get my favorite games (Flow Free and Candy Crush Saga), and there is no shortage of others.When I started up the tablet and input my Amazon log-on info, it synched up with all the books I've obtained in the past from Amazon, and had on my Kindle e-reader (old version with the keyboard on it).Setting up my e-mail accounts with the provided e-mail browser was quick and easy.So far, I haven't had to read directions, but I did buy an after market instruction manual from Amazon, which I intend to use.  Amazon has a Kindle support page on their web site, with loads of good info.  Though I've not had the need for it yet, the Kindle Fire HDX has the "Mayday" option for free, instant help from a real live person.The speed of the tablet is very fast. Moving from one screen or app to the other, or changing pages is FAST.  No problem with connecting with my Wi-Fi at home, or at work.The display is excellent, and very sharp.  We also have an Apple iPad Air, 10" size.  The display on the Kindle Fire HDX is just as sharp as the iPad.  I see no difference.I spent the $15 and turned off the "Special Offers", and disabled the suggested apps thing just below the carousel view.  There are instructions on-line if you Google something like "turn off special offers on Kindle Fire HDX."  No problem.  All gone.The tablet comes with a $5.00 credit at the Amazon app store. They call it "coins", and you get 500 of them to use when buying "paid" apps.  Once spent, you can re-up the coins for future use.Things you buy, like paying for apps, books, and everything else you might like, goes against your "one click" ordering account on Amazon.com.  Very handy, making it quite easy to spend money if you like.There is a good variety of cases/covers available for these tablets, many available on Amazon.com.  I have the Poetic Slimline case, in black.  Great case or cover, for a great price.I haven't found any negatives yet, and I don't regret getting the Kindle Fire HDX at all.  In many respects, I like the Kindle Fire HDX more than the Apple iPad (which is a great tablet - but about 3x the price - for one with 32GB). The price for the 16GB version is very reasonable.  I lucked out and got mine for free, using up my credit card bonus points I had earned.The battery seems to hold up quite well.  I'd estimate that I ran mine about 9-10 hours before charging it back up from only 5% left.

Reviews.Title: Love Kindle Fire HDX, but HATE customer service for Electronic Arts/Origin.
Reviews.Author: Robin Setliff
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX, but absolutely hate that you can't get any answers from Electronic Arts/origin regarding a forgotten password.  The phone number takes you to a message that says they have upgraded and you don't have a wait time and they will call you back.  I haven't seen a place to enter my phone number yet.  This is very disgusting.  The Mayday button on the Kindle is very helpful and even though the agent tried his best to help me, the number he gave me connected me right back to the website for EA/origin (which is worthless).  The agent is to call me back to see if the EA people could solve my problem.  He was great.

Reviews.Title: Location
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I can't stand the fact that I get prompted constantly about turning on my location based services.  Even if you have set it off, it constantly pops up no matter how many times you say no.  Time for an open source OS that who's purpose isn't to spy on you and try to get you to buy stuff from their store.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Suzanne Fuller
Reviews.Content: The picture on the screen is great. It was so easy to set up and everything from my previous kindle moved over automatically.

Reviews.Author: Lisa
Reviews.Content: I recommend Kindle Fire HDX to all my friends and family. It is the best device to take on the road!

Reviews.Title: Expected more than I got!
Reviews.Author: Chris Backeberg
Reviews.Content: The battery runs down very quickly, especially when the HDX is idle (not turned on)The Special offers - I expected a huge selection of free books - I am still searching

Reviews.Title: watch out on ipad because Kindle Fire is on fire
Reviews.Author: BigToe
Reviews.Content: it works great screen looks real good I just wish that I can switch the data when I'm in certain areas to work

Reviews.Title: love it!!!!
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Petroff "Avid Online Shopper"
Reviews.Content: I rarely use my laptop now. I don't know how I ever got through life without one of these. Just too cool. And I don't know why anyone would pay extra NOT to have the special offers. I like them. I think they're cool. And helpful. And they're screen savers. But some are done in a really cool way. I just don't get it. My mom got one without the offers. Don't see the difference between them. Except for the screen savers ads. So what. Don't care. Love it!!!!UPDATE.......I get really cool ads when I turn on my kindle. Like, "free app for the day", or "how about this book, its on sale, learn more," okay I will!. Found an awesome book that way. Never would have found it any other way. Its called "Elimination Night". Written by Anonymous. So there's another reason why I don't mind the ads.

Reviews.Title: love it! just bought it yesterday
Reviews.Author: Alaska907 "Ed"
Reviews.Content: I have had the iPad mini, the iPad with retina display and love this tablet! It all depends on why you want the tablet. I wanted it primarily for reading and wanted a good tablet with retina display or better small and light. This fits the bill! I could not be happier. Other perks include the Facebook app, the Twitter app and email. Really, that's all anyone needs! Crystal clear light ebook reader!

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Athena "Greek Goddess"
Reviews.Content: Not sure how I lived without this thing before LOL! I know it's sad that book stores are becoming as old as dinosaurs, but how nice is it to take one device and have your entire library at your finger tips! It's super cool for cookbooks because I can add my modification notes right to the recipes! I also do a lot of book reviewing directly to authors and I can make my notes in the book as I go along. I can sit in the dark and read, or outside in the sun and have no problems. Love it!

Reviews.Title: This was a gift from my son.
Reviews.Author: Pete Peterson
Reviews.Content: I am a 84 year old first time user of such a product.  In the short time since receiving the Kindle I am very well satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: kylayda
Reviews.Content: Cause I have one it is very fun to play with and it is hd plus It as all the games u would want to play except for flappy bird

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with my new Kindle. I bought my first Kindle several years ago and the improvement over the years is awesome. I would just like to trade in my old Kindles as I upgrade.

Reviews.Title: not for me
Reviews.Author: lee thomas
Reviews.Content: Not versatile at all and if you want something that is usegull without a WiFi as well, look elsewhere. wife likes it for parental controls, games and books. I went with much more capable Asus nexus. Same price but more uses, especially off line.

Reviews.Title: FireOS is horrible
Reviews.Author: Lode
Reviews.Content: So the hardware i okay, but the FireOS is reall horrible.If you are 80 years old and have no experience with technology,this would be an amazing buy.Else, change the damn rom.

Reviews.Title: My first Kindle
Reviews.Author: Wayne Kuphal
Reviews.Content: I love it!! a review has to be longer than that. I read books on mine. You swipe to turn pages. you can highlight in multiple colors paragraphs, multiple lines, or single words you want. if you decide you no longer want the highlights. you can erase them. you cannot do that with a paper book (hard or soft cover).

Reviews.Title: love it!!
Reviews.Author: Tiffany
Reviews.Content: This was my Valentine's Day gift, I love it..  I have always wanted one and now that I have one I want to use it all the time.  I am still learning how to use mine but its fun to learn on!!

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: happy mom
Reviews.Content: I have never had a tablet device before. I received a Kindle Fire HDX for Christmas and I love it. It is perfect to use on day trips with my 2 year old and it is so user friendly. I can use the free-time app and let my little one listen to all his books and play his games. Only once have I had a problem and I used the mayday app and a very nice and friendly lady looked into the problem and is working on fixing it for me. This is a great system.

Reviews.Title: love it!
Reviews.Author: Lily
Reviews.Content: I bought this as an all purpose tablet, but i did not realize how much I would enjoy it. My daughter uses the FreeTime feature to practice math and spelling, and the toddlers want the peek a boo barn app. I use it to read. I watch movies on netflix. Email app is easier to navigate than a pc. Light so you can take it anywhere and slim so I can hide it from the kids when I need to. My favorite feature is the May day button. You press it and minutes later you are talking to a human being!

Reviews.Title: My first Kindle, LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: Rachel Doden
Reviews.Content: This is my first Kindle so I have nothing to really compare to but I just love it. The picture is awesome, it's super fast and it's just so pretty. My only problem with it is you can only take selfies with it (and I'm not too big on selfies), but I knew that before I bought it. I love, love, love my new Kindle HDX and if you are considering purchasing it, DOOOOOOO IT!! You won't regret it!! (and it comes FULLY CHARGED!!!)

Reviews.Title: Love it!!!
Reviews.Author: Julie Zieman
Reviews.Content: This is my first time with a tablet.  Have a lot to learn but I'm getting the hang of it.  Hate to say this but my grandchildren can work it better than me so I guess they will show me the ropes!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Not your typical user
Reviews.Author: David Browning
Reviews.Content: I own several Kindles ranging from basic readers to variations of the HD/HDX. Some of these devices I use as Amazon intended; others are modified to suit specific needs/interests. From a hardware perspective the HDX is outstanding and an attractive alternative to the Nexus 7 if you don't need GPS, NFC or wireless charging. On smaller tablets I prefer the Kindle form factor as I find it easer to hold in any orientation without worrying about accidental screen touches/activations. When purchased I assumed root access and perhaps an alternative ROM would eventually be needed. Turns out a different launcher (Apex or Nova) and a few side loaded apps from 1Mobile were all that was required. Didn't even need to root my HDX which technically voids Amazon's warranty. The "Mojito" operating environment is more flexible than earlier Amazon/Fire ROMs; most Android apps run perfectly with exception to the Play store (admittedly a biggie) and some Google creations. I can live without those. And I still have easy access to Prime movies and a few native Amazon apps that I happen to prefer. With minimal time and effort my HDX makes an excellent Android tablet that still leverages the best Amazon has to offer.

Reviews.Title: Great Product.
Reviews.Author: exmptle
Reviews.Content: I took this on a trip recently.  It was very handy for following the news doing general searches.  Not the best for the various map services.  I found it very easy to connect to the Wi-Fi in each hotel we stayed at.  My only complaint about this product is that it's way too sensitive to touch.  It's hard to scroll through screens without opening something about which you have no interest.

Reviews.Title: Gift
Reviews.Author: Roger McKee
Reviews.Content: My wife loves it keeps her from having to go to computer everytime she wants something and also loves playing games on it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7
Reviews.Author: Rebecca L Hope
Reviews.Content: I really love my kindle fire hdx 7.  It works great. Great size too. I would recommend it to others.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT
Reviews.Author: mystery reader
Reviews.Content: It makes purchasing books sooooooo easy.  Only had it about two weeks and already I have read about 8 books.  Only negative is that it should have had a two way camera

Reviews.Title: Just perfect
Reviews.Author: Cynthia Wright
Reviews.Content: Great value, lot of applications, fast the size is perfect for me, long battery life......my best gift to myself all year

Reviews.Title: works smoothly
Reviews.Author: rene lafontaine
Reviews.Content: this is our families third Kindle and the Best . It is so seamless and the picture is really exactly as nice as they say . I stayed with the smaller size and I was right in doing so very easy in carrying around or in the purse .

Reviews.Title: A Happy Skeptic
Reviews.Author: Schean
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical about purchasing a Kindle.  I'm a big Samsung fan and have recommended the Galaxy Tab and Note to more than just a few family and friends.  However, a really good friend of mine has been using her kindle for a few years now so I thought I'd give it a try.The Kindle Fire HDX is everything she said it was and more.  The display is incredibly brilliant, the sound is great, the battery life is excellent and it has an awesome selection of apps available through Amazon.  Bang for the buck....it's a great deal.  I take it with me everywhere.

Reviews.Title: Better than IPAD!
Reviews.Author: Guy Mitchell
Reviews.Content: My wife has an IPAD and i bought this for academic reasons because I am a graduate student, but this purchase had turned out better than expected. The size of the kindle fire is more convenient as it rest gently in your hands, the great visuals, and awesome price make this a great buy.

Reviews.Title: Great replacement for my Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: The HDX functions similar to my smartphone so was easy to acclimate to.  Everything is user-friendly.  Vivd colors on the screen are brilliant and beautiful.  There are differences from my Kindle Fire, and the differences are all improvements.  Happy with this new and improved Kindle Fire HDX 7".

Reviews.Title: Love my Kindle
Reviews.Author: Teutonic Lady "Victoria"
Reviews.Content: Now I can watch my favorite programs and movies while lying in bed or sitting down, can answer emails, and even surf the net, but the biggest thing that it's done is that I am really reading again.  Should actually get the paperwhite as it would be even easier on the eyes.I have a very nice router, and it's sorely needed if you want to stream movies, and it really works beautifully, but if I were buying it for a friend, I would pay the extra so I could use it anywhere.

Reviews.Title: Granddaughter loves it, but
Reviews.Author: Caroline Ellis
Reviews.Content: My granddaughter doesn't live with me, so I haven't personally used it - she loves it, however, I had to input my credit card information for her to download free apps and I'm not happy about that.

Reviews.Title: Definitely better than iPad
Reviews.Author: Gardenwitch
Reviews.Content: I have both an iPad 2 and just got a Kindle Fire HD.....no contest.  Love the 7" Kindle and the resolution is fantastic.  Wifi is much faster and love the ability to use Android voice input.  Still getting used to the features, but it's fun to explore.

Reviews.Title: Why I love my Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Connie S. Gray
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire HDX, it is easy to use and has great graphics.The only issue I have is the front facing camera, a total waste.  It would be better if it were rear facing, then you wouldn't have to struggle to stay out of the picture.But, everything else about the Fire HDX, I absolutely love.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire Oh Yea!
Reviews.Author: barefoot
Reviews.Content: I was hard pressed to give up my new kindle fire 7" hdx, certainly because it was a christmas gift from my wife. But I found out a few things about my phone provider when they wanted me to exchange my kindle fire for their tablet. Not only was i being scammed But was informed later... and was able to get out of it before the very short dead line contract expired. I'm glad very glad in fact that I didn't give up my Kindle Fire or return it. It's very fast and it's all I need. Glad I didn't screw up there. I really like this tablet it's my 1st been following this for awhile and when during christmas if you was a store card holder you could by this shipping free for 179.00 what a deal! wow! no regrets here.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my uses-The Kindle Fire has reinvented its best with the HDX
Reviews.Author: Swtbear13
Reviews.Content: I had the Kindle fire for about a year and a half. I loved it but needed more memory quickly enough. When I saw the new HDX had 64 gb available it had my attention but I was skeptical about how different they could possibly be.Well I am here to tell you that the quality has greatly improved. The screen is noticably more clear when comparing the two. Also the HDX is considerably lighter- so much so that when I put the HDX into a case with a wireless bluetooth keyboard included it was still lighter than my original HD.The sound quality is what I expected and I havent tested the range of the wifi but as of now I have never had a problem with connecting with a wifi signal.Battery life is as advertised and works well for me because I take my HDX to class and type notes for my courses with it.Overall I am thrilled with this product and everyday I try to find new ways to use it!

Reviews.Title: It's Perfect
Reviews.Author: Vnyrdstar
Reviews.Content: All I can say, is I ended up buying TWO the 7" for my son and then the 8"9 for myself. I know people who have Ipads but why pay more for pretty much the same thing. And, I use Amazon for so much more. I also have a dell xps that doesn't fit into my purse. We are so happy with our Kindles we can read, watch and purchase anything, anywhere we want. We wouldn't be caught without them, and we don't have to. Yeah !!

Reviews.Title: I love my Kindle Fire HDX, even after a few months
Reviews.Author: Amaris W
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a tablet where I have lots of fun while being able to read any book I choose and immediately purchase.  The Kindle Fire HDX is the perfect device for me. The screen is clear, the device is beautiful, the device is light, and the processing is super fast. Purchasing my Kindle was a perfect holiday treat because I had time to read and play games. The Kindle fire HDX made traveling home for Christmas so much fun (the free TV viewing did not work on my device while on the plane, which was problematic. But I read, listened to music, and played angry birds).The amount of time I now use my laptop has dropped down to only 25%, because this device has everything I need leisure-wise, especially for emails and Facebook. In fact, I prefer to deal with my emails only on my Kindle device. I only go to my laptop if I need to type documents or prepare documents for school and work.The Kindle is great too because it has a voice dictation software already installed which cuts my typing down significantly. This feature is important because with my physical disability, typing can be difficult on any device.I really enjoy this device, and I am glad I got it, instead of an iPad.

Reviews.Title: Not That Intuitive
Reviews.Author: John T. Zipple "CMU Prof"
Reviews.Content: Bought for my wife. She has struggled with the learning curve because there were no instructions that came with the tablet. She likes the instantaneous online support and is amazed at the resolution of the screen and the capacity of the tablet (32GB). She absolutely loves it.

Reviews.Title: Better than the original
Reviews.Author: Josie
Reviews.Content: I purchased my HDX 7" only because my original was stolen. With the new version I didn't know what I was missing. I like having the additional storage of 64GB and the Bluetooth. I did like the heaviness of the original but the slimness is the HDX 7" is sleek. I did get a case and a screen protector because I prefer to protect my investments. I ave it a few months now and the any glitches resemble that of a smartphone so any trouble shooting is resolved but powering off (pressing down for 20 seconds) , waiting 45 seconds and then powering on. So far the device has froze (no response to screen at all) and there was an issue with the volume not responding and no sound came from the device from any option such as music or video. At first I felt like a sell out but getting the HDX 7" w/ Special Offers but I was on a budget and there was a sale. So far the adds don't bother me and I'm have not been offended by any of them. Overall this is a great device and always my first choice for an e-reader/tablet.

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet for the Price
Reviews.Author: Darrell McCarroll
Reviews.Content: Overall, this is an excellent tablet, but it isn't perfect.Pros:Outstanding displayFast processorGreat priceGreat supportAmazon prime videosCons:No GPS or CompassAmazon's ecosystem simply does not have many of the apps I use on other Android devices.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: JoyMo
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle.  Now, I wish I had purchased the larger one.  Was a bit disappointed that I don't have the front and back camera.  I believe that it would be a lot easier to take pictures.  I have a new great-grandbaby and am always taking pictures and I think it would be better if I had gone the distance and gotten the next size.  But all and all I do love this Kindle.

Reviews.Title: Nice Product for the Price
Reviews.Author: Angela Smallwood
Reviews.Content: Beautiful display; especially for watching movies.  Sufficient battery life for my needs. Keep on charge when not in use and ready when I need.

Reviews.Title: Better than the NookColor HD
Reviews.Author: Rachel Kelman
Reviews.Content: Better than the Nook Color HD by far.  The Kindle Fire HDX 7 is much faster, more vibrant, and includes more features.  Plus many books are cheaper with the amazon prime membership.

Reviews.Title: I use it all the time
Reviews.Author: Jason
Reviews.Content: This is one of my favorite things now, I use it all the time. Battery life is good and the wireless antenna is strong. I read my books on it every day. I do really like regular paper books though.......but this is great at books, games, and surfing the internet when not near my desktop.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: TGill
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle Fire HDX!!  I have the first edition Kindle which I loved.  Received the Fire HDX as a Christmas gift.  Love it love it love!  Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Very Happy!
Reviews.Author: rob sydiskis
Reviews.Content: This is my first tablet and I love it. It was a Christmas gift, I did not ask for it, but am very happy someone thought I of me.

Reviews.Title: bought for son
Reviews.Author: Ranger16
Reviews.Content: we bought this for our 9 yo son for xmas. he loves it and started using it himself right out of the box. great screen. no issues. one thing i will advise others on- phone chargers with the same plug will probably not charge the kindle. it really requires its own charger that it comes with. charges quickly too. hope this helps.

Reviews.Title: Love my fire.
Reviews.Author: Raena S. White "My three sons"
Reviews.Content: I live this product. The picture is very clear and the speed is much faster then my original fire. I love the mayday button the camera is not really needed. Just wish the battery lasted longer.

Reviews.Title: Kindle
Reviews.Author: Sidney B.
Reviews.Content: love my kindle and treasure it.  So handy to use for a lot of things.  definitely better than an ipad.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX
Reviews.Author: I.Thornlimb
Reviews.Content: Excited to see all this Kindle can do, I slowly am learning and really appreciate Mayday, it is great! I enjoy buying books, games, etc. from Amazon and receiving them immediately, thank you Amazon!!!

Reviews.Title: Good for the price
Reviews.Author: Freddy H Cortez
Reviews.Content: Good:  Great display and colors. Good sound. Easy navigation.Not so good:  No access to google play apps.  No rear camera

Reviews.Title: good for travel
Reviews.Author: megan
Reviews.Content: I bought this specifically to travel, I like it's size, screen is perfect and the sound is great for Pandora. I will be able to use this instead of a bulky laptop.

Reviews.Title: First Tablet
Reviews.Author: T. E. Roth
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying having a tablet.  If I was to do it over again I may have picked up the 8.9" version.  Otherwise this product is great!  There are a few financial apps that are not compatible with the tablet that are compatible with my other smart phones. I'm glad it has the swype to text feature big plus over the Apple keyboard(4S).Reading is easy on the eyes the glare sometimes fools you though.Id like to have a home button to use because the side bar feature sometimes gets in the way of using an app.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Christina Rardin
Reviews.Content: I love it.  Easy to use, lots of apps, light weight, and the screen is very clear.  You should really get a case for it because it is really thin.

Reviews.Title: wait before you buy
Reviews.Author: Travis T. Foss
Reviews.Content: Wait before they improve it before you buy. First, it doesn't have many apps you probably want. My bank app isn't available (capital one).  No YouTube app. No podcast player app. My favorite game app doesn't make them for the kindle. No decent weather apps are available. Second, you are stuck with the kindle browser, Silk. No chrome, Firefox, atomic, or safari. Silk is an ok browser but it doesn't handle embedded video very well. Lots of freezing and unexpected hangs. Bookmarks are awkward. Third, the touch screen is glitchier than my iPad. The cursor jumps around randomly. Good luck getting the cursor to go where you want it to when typing. Fourth, it's not easy to switch between apps. The OS stores everything in memory and the performance suffers if you use too many apps, and there's no way to close the ones you aren't using. I found myself shutting it down and restarting frequently. Fifth, a big selling point was the "one free rental book a month" deal with the kindle. But the selection is SMALL and it's impossible to search the lending library. Amazon sells the "lending library" hard, but it's clear it's not ready for primetime. Finally, some of my favorite websites are slow and glitchy with the silk browser (like slate).  The browser often hangs for no reason, even when my broadband is working fine.More rrestarting.

Reviews.Title: It was a gift for my mom, but I love it too....
Reviews.Author: Cujodu
Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my mom, and a replacement for her original kindle.  But let me tell you why it's amazing for a 70-year-old... the button that brings up the Amazon rep to take care of any problems.  If every electronic device had that button I would never again have to fix my mom's computer, iPod, telephone, or etc. problems.  That would be heaven.

Reviews.Title: Overal disappointed.
Reviews.Author: drachehexe
Reviews.Content: I got this because my Android phone's screen was too small for reading and some gaming and note taking.  This is great for reading and web-surfing, in games tho the menu tab in full screen games gets in the way a lot of the time, especially the hidden object games where the tab can cover something you need to click on preventing you from progressing.I also don't like the limitations of setting up your home screen.  There is VERY little customization, my android phone is much more user interface friendly, this, this is just messy.If you can manage through the funky menu system it's a good device, good reader, good gamer, good surfer, just lousy interface, not overly user friendly at all.

Reviews.Title: Very nice tablet.
Reviews.Author: Dan R. Mason
Reviews.Content: This tablet is an upgrade from my 7 inch Kindle Fire HD. I think this tablet is great with just one negative. I prefer the speakers at the end of the tablet like on the old Kindle Fire HD. However, this tablet is so much faster and with the 64 GB of storage I can do so much more.

Reviews.Title: Xmas Gift for My Wife
Reviews.Author: Myron B.
Reviews.Content: I only have used it once, but my wife is on it all day long.  We are a five Kindle household (of 2) and this Kindle is the best to date.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire 7"
Reviews.Author: Alvin C. Fogelman "onlineshopper"
Reviews.Content: I have found this to be very convenient for traveling. It is so much less bulky. for transporting. My only regret is that I couldn't afford to purchase the 8" at the time.

Reviews.Title: kindle review
Reviews.Author: Dolly
Reviews.Content: I absolutely loved my original kindle fire,but the kindle fire HDX is amazing,the graphics are so clear.I compared it to the picture on my original kindle and there is a big difference.the May day feature is a life saver for someone who doesn't know how to do very much on a computer.the people who answer your call are wonderful,they are so patient and knowledgeable.lts a great machine,I highly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed.
Reviews.Author: pjhempe2
Reviews.Content: I really like the smaller size from my iPad, however am very disappointed in the camera. I had hoped I would be able to use it to take pictures and video as well as use it for video chat. I returned it and most likely not get the 8.9 because it is not as compact.

Reviews.Title: Great, but needs a couple small tweeks
Reviews.Author: Stan
Reviews.Content: Just needs flash support and a way to reset the "free time" parent password if you forget it. You have to reset the device if you ever forget your password and you'll lose all your apps. Otherwise it's a great little machine!

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: E. Hoogland
Reviews.Content: I thought it would be difficult giving up "real" books, but my Kindle is wonderful--I wish I hadn't waited so long to get one. And the features of the Kindle Fire are just enough for me (not too overwhelming for a 60-something)!

Reviews.Title: Very, Very  Disappointed!
Reviews.Author: Nichole Zackos
Reviews.Content: I previously owned the original kindle fire which I loved. When I purchased this one the kindle fire HDX I thought it would be as great or better than first one but I was actually disappointed .  My major issues with this kindle are ...The battery  takes so long to charge, dies extremely fast, and even when plugged in does not charge while in use. My previous kindle charged quickly even in use and had an amazing battery life!  I even called customer service and they said there's was a problem with it. Guess what? When I was sent the new one it worked just as bad as before.My next issue is What happened to flash player?!  My old kindle has it! And now when I go to watch certain shows I used to watch or when I go to amazon to view a product video I can't view it anymore!!Next ..  i used to watch the network apps such as the cw ect..  on my previous tablet and still do with no problems. but when i watch them on my HDX they time out whenever the commercial break happens, I have to actually exit the app ,go into my wifi , turn it off, and then back on again to get it to work! Once back in i have to fast foward to where i left off ! This is something i also asked about when in called customer service and was told it was the kindle and my internet. if this were true then why does it work perfectly on the old kindle? Again got the new HDX replaced and still have same issue to this day. It's not my Internet !  I've even been to places that only use one device in there home and have way better internet than me and my kindle still does this ! It was a huge disappointment!In my opinion they took more away and only added a camera.  If they keep this up I don't think I'll be buying anymore kindles in the future. Its sad cause I really did like them and thought the gave apple a good competitor.

Reviews.Title: My favorite toy
Reviews.Author: Mark "mkw"
Reviews.Content: I have lots of electronics, but this is my favorite one.  I use it every day.  I used to think that I preferred to read books on paper, but with this it is far easier.  I especially enjoy reading in bed and don't have to worry about a light disturbing my wife- plus, I use it to do crosswords, Sudoku, check my trading account during the day and more.  Frankly, I like it more than my IPad- it is smaller and easier to carry, and since it cost about 2/3 less, I don't worry about it getting damaged or stolen and I feel like I can take it everywhere.

Reviews.Title: oh so happy.
Reviews.Author: jane
Reviews.Content: Love my new HDX.  Was really easy to set up and have only hadto ask for help from"media" a couple of times. Did buy two booksfor help tips that were helpful. Camera is really good and Skype somuch fun. Good job on this new HDX.

Reviews.Title: my Kindle fire
Reviews.Author: Joan Denman
Reviews.Content: Very pleased!  Works great for what I need. And the Mayday support is beyond perfect. love it. Never have had any problems buying anything from Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Sharon Mendenhall
Reviews.Content: I love my Kindle Fire.  My daughter gave it to me for Christmas.  I have downloaded any books yet, but plan to in the future.  I love the soft touch.

Reviews.Title: Does what it suppose to do !!!
Reviews.Author: Joseph Corbett
Reviews.Content: Now all you people saying it doesn't do this or that, well it's not suppose to.So for what it was designed to do, it does very well.I read lots of book using Prime, just hope they don't raise the cost of it.I watched movies without an issue, through Amazon, Netflix, Hulu+, ect... no issues there. The dedicated Volume buttons make it a lot better then my prior standard Kindle Fire.Emails, Facebook and other Social Media works without any issues.Web Browser works well, prior Kindle Fire would say need to update web browser, Amazon we need an update on the older Kindle Fire.~Joseph

Reviews.Title: Fire HDX 7
Reviews.Author: Larry W. Arrington
Reviews.Content: I have really enjoyed my Fire HDX in the 7" version. It's easy to hold, eliminating wrist fatigue. And the sound is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Purchased to replace my first Kindle
Reviews.Author: David M
Reviews.Content: Great Kindle...faster than my first one....has great resolution and new operating system...and as usual it has all of the Kindle features and book buying power

Reviews.Title: What a fantastic unit !
Reviews.Author: KatsRule
Reviews.Content: I loved my first generation kindle fire...and just wanted the better display and sound that I read about in reviews.I am so happy I decided to buy this light weight product...that is so easy to carry...I take it to work in my lunch bag everyday. It is so nice to use the free wifi at the college I go to as a worker....and share the movies in HD content and loud sound..often I haveseveral fellow employees watching over my shoulder ..and I have to just laugh each time. We all enjoy this productsfeatures..crisp clear high definition video and fast wifi play down...(playdown means it does not skip in the wifi, always giving a constant uninterrupted video right off a fast speed internet..  I use wifi...).I actually bought two units.  .  . and both my wife and I sit almost all night playing free downloaded games from the Amazon App Store...and we are simply GLUED to these tablets.  Our best apps include.. The weather channel..Amazon free App Games...our outside home security cameras...(which I can view anywhere at anytime in the world on this unit)...  I love how where ever I go..if there is free wifi near me..the kindle fire hdx  automatically connects with my permission...and I zoom off to never never land onto the internet/movies/weather conditions/local and world news.  I simply just LOVE this Kindle Fire HDX 7" Display, Wi-Fi , 16 GB - Included Special Offers.  WE LOVE IT !

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Cari
Reviews.Content: Expected this to be like my older kindle.  A great and easy way to purchase and read books.  What I got was actually a tablet.  I haven't needed to touch my home computer since I first turned my kindle fire on.  Love it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX 7"
Reviews.Author: Jim in Calimesa
Reviews.Content: I am delighted with my new Kindle Fire HDX 7"!  I purchase and read books--without accumulating physical books to crowd shelves and require an addition to my home!  I watch wonderful high definition movies and other programming--even in bed.  The brightness and clarity of the screen are amazing.  The volume really surprised me--no need for earbuds.  The battery just seems to go on forever... There are so many uses I haven't even explored.  What a wonderful device for education and entertainment!

Reviews.Title: My first Kindle!
Reviews.Author: Glenda Seay
Reviews.Content: It's my first Kindle, so I don't have anything to compare it to, but I think it's going to be great.  I have eye problems and I love that you can enlarge the print.  Since it's still new to me, I am still learning about it.  I'm certainly impressed thus far!

Reviews.Title: kindle my fourth
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: would have given it a five except for how to start with it.  took a while to get it up and running.  Still not able  to get my email account but will keep trying.  Great for reading my books and some items from amazon.

Reviews.Title: Education assistant
Reviews.Author: Zumba Kelly
Reviews.Content: This device is pretty easy to use & it keeps my 8 yr old entertained with games and books....if it helps me get her reading it gets points in my book!!!!

Reviews.Title: Stunning
Reviews.Author: kpal
Reviews.Content: I truly love it!!! But difficult finding Wi-Fi when you live in such a rural area and have  none within miles. wish it came with 3g like my older Kindle....overall a hit!!

Reviews.Title: love it!!
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Kindle fire was exactly what I needed!I love I can take my books everywhere with me! Exactly what I need on my trips!

Reviews.Title: loving it
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer "Keitha S. Joseph"
Reviews.Content: the size is just right for me, small, light and the features are great. the screen quality is exceptional. would definitely recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!!
Reviews.Author: Darline Valcin "cheloo"
Reviews.Content: This was a birthday gift from my husband and also an up grade from my older kindle. It is easier to maneuver on the fire compared to the older version I have. My daughter also enjoys it because her books are in color and not black and white.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Higley
Reviews.Content: After buying a Kindle White for my wife for Christmas, I fell in love with it and had to have my own, but I needed the upgrade to the Kindle Fire HDX 7".

Reviews.Title: Very pleased!
Reviews.Author: Suzie Evans
Reviews.Content: Love the screen.. So much easier on the eyes. I have a samsung galaxy tab, I prefer the kindle by far.

Reviews.Title: Having a Kindle Hdx 32Gb Is great
Reviews.Author: melvena Francise
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure I really wanted this But now that I have it aND i'M LEARNING TO USE IT. It is fun and entertaining. I like hav ing it when I go to bed and there isn't anything I want to see on TV.

Reviews.Title: THE BEST TABLET THEIR IS
Reviews.Author: Dale Evans
Reviews.Content: Unbelievably fantastic it works perfectly and the resolution is phenominal, thank you KINDLE? I also have an IPad and this unit is superior in clarity and design, shouldn`t have died STEVE.

Reviews.Title: Web cripple
Reviews.Author: stephen malyn
Reviews.Content: Great tab, but until the Flash issue is solved, not perfect. I know they are working on it , but not fixed yet.

Reviews.Title: It's Great
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: I love it.  It is so easy to run and does so many things.' I seem to learn something new each time I use it.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX 7 is awesome
Reviews.Author: Shawn Muder
Reviews.Content: Love this tablet.  I thought my first gen Kindle Fire was good, but this one makes it look like an abacus.  So far, I have had little problems with the Kindle.  Only issue is a little screen flicker when reading a book which was significantly reduced when I turned auto-brightness back on.  I love the sharp screen, the X-ray bonus features from IMDB is also nice, since when watching a show or movie I often wonder who is playing who, especially when it's not a main character.  The improved 'carousel' and apps screen is also a nice improvement.

Reviews.Title: Love My Kindle Fire
Reviews.Author: TFLIII
Reviews.Content: The Kindle Fire is allot of fun!! It has exceeded my expectations. It is very easy to use. As always Amazon delivered as promised.

Reviews.Title: KINDLE FIRE  HDX IS NOT AN APPLE
Reviews.Author: MontanaOutdoorsman
Reviews.Content: The screen is sharp and clear, so it is great for reading and watching you tube videos. The reason I only gave it  4 stars is some of the features that come with it don't work as they should. The first one that comes to mind is the speech to text. It works very sporadic. One in three times it will work. What I do like is when it does work it's pretty accurate as far as words. I guess I am somewhat disappointed because we have an IPad and there is no comparison between the two. (In my opinion anyway) the iPad is a lot easier to navigate around on, speech to text always works as well. The touch sceen on the iPad also works a lot smoother and is more accurate. They say the android system is getting the bugs worked out and works as well as Apple.  I have to disagree, because of having both I can do side by side comparisons, and everything I have tried the winner is clearly Apple. If you can afford it the iPad is two times the machine. My opinion only.

Reviews.Title: Anyone can work a Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Graham
Reviews.Content: Very easy to use, even for someone who is not electronically inclined. Was fearful to even try one in the store let alone actually have one, but it almost works by itself.

Reviews.Title: poor support
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: my unit came with an installed calendar, which was advertized as being able to synch with my outlook calendar on my laptop. when it would not work  I tried manually entering data. even that would not work.  i went to the direct personal support system. they were unable to provide a solution and after a long delay they gave up. I eventually downloaded another calender system which , while not able to synch at least I was able to input data.

Reviews.Title: Kindle HDX - 7
Reviews.Author: tink1333
Reviews.Content: I couldn't be happier! My brother just bought the new iPad air & he even had to admit, the Kindle Fire HDX has a greater clarity then any tablet put there on the market.

Reviews.Title: MY WONDERFUL DEVICE!
Reviews.Author: Ricardo from California
Reviews.Content: Is an easy way to surf trough internet. It has the perfect size to handle it. The sound is awesome. I can do almost everything  without a big effort. I really like my kindle fire. (My daughter's christmas gift)

Reviews.Title: Kindle vs Kindle Fire HD vs Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Donna M. Weigel "Donna Weigel"
Reviews.Content: I had a kindle before the Kindle fire ( and I waited for the HD version) that I loved but was becoming limited since I also wanted to convenience of checking email and going on the internet, following links in a ebook etc.  I was so in love with my regular kindle and was a reading fool on that thing. I had a relationship with it. Let’s face it, I slept with it more than I have any man. Lol.  Giving it up and moving on was not an easy decision.Kindle vs Kindle Fire HD vs Fire HDX.Kindle:  Love the light shining on the book rather back lit.  It is far less stressful reading.  The gray background allowed me to read forever easily.  I loved how easy it was to organize books. However, it had become limited.  I couldn’t really surf the internet, magazines and pictures wouldn’t work on it well and it was black and white.  Pretty sure you know the rest.Kindle Fire:  I don’t by the first of anything because it will improve and become cheaper.  The biggest issue with the kindle fire was it didn’t have a reader and I do use that often.  The front page was a bookshelf which is ok but couldn’t organize like the reg kindle.Kindle Fire HD:  I hate the carousel on kindle fire HD.  It’s a circle of icons in which the last thing you opened goes up there.  Want it or not.  You can delete from the carousel but something else will pop up there that is on your device. It has a set number of icons it wants there and it will keep it filled.  Grrr.  I wish it would just go away.  I liked how I could organize my books on the regular kindle.  That said, there are apps that make that happen so it makes life easier. You know there HAS to be an app for that!  Over all the organization isn’t bad. It’s simple to use.  My six year old can use it no problem. But then again, kids are born knowing these things today.  Being back lit vs light shining on the book isn’t as easy to read as the original kindle was.  The back light can be adjusted way down which is a plus. I don’t think this is a big issue to most people.  I’m dyslexic and having dimmer light on the gray background rocked!  I could be a reading fool.  I can’t read as long on this.  As I said though for most people that probably isn’t an issue.  After my withdraw from my original kindle I love this one.  SO much more you can do with it!!  The battery doesn’t last like the original but we are doing WAY more with this one than just read.  AND naturally there is an app for that!!!  There are battery savers that shut down what isn’t needed and does make a difference in battery life.  Considering with I do however I think the battery isn’t bad. I play music and a game at the same time or music and read, music and read.  I am asking a lot! I was use to the other battery lasting for weeks.  One plus is my phone charger works for the kindle.  I’m just overall too happy with the upgrade to Kindle Fire HD.HD vs HDX.I got the HD with Ads because I didn’t care to pay to not have them. I’m really glad I did that.  I like the ads.  There were some movie and TV trailers that I would have otherwise missed.  Product ads you never know but they aren't annoying at all.My son bought the HDX.  He loves it.As far as I can tell the big difference is with the HDX you can have Wifi and cell towers.  Oh and the live help.  I asked if I could upgrade because it came out right after I bought my HD. The answer was no, I would need to sell it myself.  I’m glad I didn’t. I don’t need to use cell towers.  Some might where they live but I don’t.  As for live help, once you learn your kindle do you really need that?  I didn’t for the price difference.  Last I knew it was a good $200 difference.  I’m sure the price will go down, the HD will be priced at peanuts and it will all balance out in time.  It seems about a year is when the big price change happens.Good luck with your new decisions!

Reviews.Title: I had a Kindle Fire before
Reviews.Author: Katgirl2
Reviews.Content: I used my Kindle Fire for 2 years before getting my Kindle Fire HDX.  I always loved my 'regular' Kindle, but love the HDX even ,ore! It loads much faster, is more clear and has more GBs than the older model.  I can now take pics and store/edit/save them - I didn't realize how much of a difference that makes to me (even if I can only take the pics from the front of the Kindle with this model).  It was super easy to transfer the books that I had purchased from one device to the other. . . I was happily surprised.I do not like the one and only cover option for this newer tablet.  I have knocked it off a few times, as it is only 'held' on by magnets (it IS nice that it folds into a stand, though).  I am not taking any stars off of my rating because of the cover.I would buy another one in a heartbeat, if needed - it is that nice.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Pamela Ley
Reviews.Content: I am loving my new Kindle HDX.  I got it for Christmas and have read more books since getting it than I've read in a year.  They're much cheaper and accessible.  Plus I can read in bed while my husband sleeps since I don't need to have a light on anymore.  I can get on the Internet quickly and don't have to drag around my big laptop.  It's also convenient for checking my email.  The only draw back is that the camera lens is on the front (facing you) so the only thing you can really do is take selfies, which I DON'T do.  But it does take great pictures as long as you can aim the lens just right.  Other than that it's great!!

Reviews.Title: I love my little computer!
Reviews.Author: Cheri
Reviews.Content: I love the smaller size (same size as my older Kindle). I can easily take it wherever I go. Lot of free apps (Facebook, email, games; skype, movies and TV shows, Netflix, the web, Amazon shopping, and many more). I LOVE my Kindle Fire HDX 7"!!!  Cheryl Metz

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX
Reviews.Author: Janet P Brown
Reviews.Content: Love my Kindle! Ease of downloading, perfect size and weight. Great for reading books and listening to music. Also great value for the price.

Reviews.Title: It's Okay
Reviews.Author: chad
Reviews.Content: Compared to a nexus 7 which is the same price, the HDX seems to have a slower processor.  It's not as snappy as I would like it to be.  Kindle has a proprietary App Store.  Some apps I really enjoy on my android nexus 5 I can't get on the HDX without sideloading.  I don't feel like I should have side load.  The HDX has a front facing camera, but lacks a rear facing camera.  All in all it's okay, but I feel I could have done better with my 200 bucks by getting a nexus 7.

Reviews.Title: HDX
Reviews.Author: Finnan
Reviews.Content: Awesome awesome really awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome awesome totally awesome really cool so awesome it's really impressive and amazing you should get it

Reviews.Title: Kindle Fire HDX7"
Reviews.Author: roz h.
Reviews.Content: I give my new Kindle HDX a 5 star rating because I love it. It is easy to use. The color is great. It gives ease of access to the internet and Wi-Fi usage. My only complaint is that book print is not as large as my old Kindle. I received it as a gift and have used it since the first day.

Reviews.Title: It has been an exception purchase
Reviews.Author: Donna E. Redmond
Reviews.Content: I like it because it is very versatile for my needs. It is very clear in its picture quality. Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Great for price!
Reviews.Author: bloop
Reviews.Content: My roommates iPad air really isn't that much better.  For the price I would pick this one even though my laptop is a Mac.

Reviews.Title: it is hard to take pictures
Reviews.Author: Dennis Moyer Jr
Reviews.Content: would have liked it better if it had a camera  that faced forward,and I thought it was suppose to be clearer

Reviews.Title: HDX tablet
Reviews.Author: Candice McGaugh
Reviews.Content: I am unsure if all HDX screens do this, but it almost blinks from bright to dim. I haven't damaged it, but did notice that in a corner of the screen where it looks different lighting wise. Other than that, the mayday button is great and the xray music is awesome.

Reviews.Title: internal wireless problem
Reviews.Author: Michael Dale
Reviews.Content: My wife bought me this Kindle for Christmas and I really like it, except for it not holding the wireless signal. I have to reset the wireless setting almost every time I power up the Kindle and sometimes when I am using my email and surfing the web. This is becoming extremely frustrating. I have searched online for comments on this Kindle from other users and there are a lot of other people going through the same problem. Right now I would not recommend this Kindle to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Love it, love it.
Reviews.Author: Janet Cadigan
Reviews.Content: Previously had the Kindle Fire, first generation, so this was an upgrade.  Love the Mayday feature.  Love the selection of FREE books.  Only complaint is that I don't have enough time to read them all.  I have to do other things like sleep, eat, bathe etc.that interfere with my Kindle time.

Reviews.Title: Incredible!!
Reviews.Author: Nimue
Reviews.Content: I have always loved to read though sometimes carrying a big book around was uncomfortable.  With my Kindle fire it's a breeze and I have access to so much more.  My only regret is not having bought it before.

Reviews.Title: Sooo many improvements!
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: This is a great new Kindle! I have the Original Kindle Fire, which I love. But this new one is so much easier to use, so much more user-friendly! My husband has an i-Pad and this is very similar. I love the size (it fits easily in my purse!) and the clarity of the picture is amazing! I have it in a rooCase which puts it to sleep when I close it....very handy.The games play a lot faster and email is so simple to use; I used my "old" kindle to pick up email when we travelled, but it was not a simpe job. This new one notifies you when there's new email and is much more like my laptop to use! Very nice upgrade and will be great for travelling!My only "complaint" (not really) is that I have to start my games all over again! The levels I achieved on the old Kindle are not saved! Maybe that's a good thing though because now I have the games on both Kindles (they download themselves--mega easy!) and can play the level I feel like at any moment! Oh, I have the one with the ads and wish I had the non-ad version, FYI. Some of the little ads at the bottom flash, etc. and are very distracting. Some people said they actually like the ads but I feel they interfere with what I'm doing. I don't mind the full-page ones that you just "close" but those flashing ones are very annoying.Bottom line: This is a beautiful tablet and I love it!!!

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Oscarmeyer wieners
Reviews.Content: The only reason that I didn't give it a full rating, is because it cannot support Adobe Flash Player 8 or similar programs

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: dnsday
Reviews.Content: I love my kindle HDX 7". My husband bought one for me and one for our daughter for Christmas this year. We both use it every day. I love to play games shop the web view videos and chat with my kids and my husband all at once while in the kitchen or wherever else I may be instead of tied down to that desktop. So far between my daughter and I we have been able to do everything we have tried to do.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: regina byas-williams
Reviews.Content: I received this for Christmas and I really like it over my original Kindle Fire.  I look forward to using it for a long time.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Jeanz Holt
Reviews.Content: Overall it is really useful and runs smoothly. I use it to take notes and brief for law school. My only complaint is that it won't download pdfs from the internet (though I think that it's supposed to be able to) and the user guide isn't very helpful.

Reviews.Title: Kindle vrs. Apple I Pad 3
Reviews.Author: Joanne Carlson
Reviews.Content: I also have an Apple i Pad 3 AND THE kindle Fire HDX 7" is the best one. The colors and the operating system is better on the Kindle.This is my second Kindle and the best one yet. Reviews.Title: Depends on what you want.
Reviews.Author: ann wilson
Reviews.Content: To tell the truth I like my old original Kindle better.  The new Fire is harder to read a book on because of the glare of the pages.  Much prefer the old one's easy on the eyes screen.  I don't like the dictionary at all.  You have to page through from a to z to find the word you want.  Waste of time.  I don't much care for the games that are available.  I like word games.  I play several every day such as crossword and Scrabble on my old Kindle.  The choice of games on Fire are mostly juvenile ones with sound effects which are irritating and most of them will only let you play a game or two without paying the company who created them more money.  On the old Kindle you pay for a game up front and play to your heart's content.  I also don't like how frequently it needs recharging - even when it's just sitting around doing nothing it needs a recharge in no time.  I do like that I can pick up my email without starting up the computer. I can check it while I'm sitting around watching TV, etc.  However, you can't trash the email on your computer from your Fire, so you end up trashing it from the Kindle, then when you get into your computer, the emails are still there and you have to go through the process again..  I also don't like the front only camera.  It's very hard to take a decent picture with it because you can't see what you're focusing on.  Perhaps going up to the next level would have been better, but that was a great deal more expensive.  I'd say this is an okay device if you like to play the games a lot, don't use the dictionary very much, either don't read a lot of books or have young eyes.  But if you have an old Kindle you like for reading, word games , the dictionary and thesauras, stick with the black and white.

Reviews.Title: My Comment
Reviews.Author: Roger Turner, L.
Reviews.Content: First, I am a new user of the HDX - I expect, after I become more knowledgeable about the device, my rating will improve. One of the first things I tried to do was download the User Guide - so far, I have been unsuccessful - it has simply taken too long and it times-out. It seems reasonable that there should be an easier (faster) way.  While I am computer "literate", it has been slow finding my way around all that the HDX offers.One of the reasons I selected the HDX was the availability of the Skype App.  When I installed it, however, Skype advised that they were blocking my account - because of a break-in that occurred in 2010. Everything was resolved by Skype and my bank, and I have been using Skype on my desktop ever since.  Working with Skype to unblock my account was endlessly frustrating.A minor point. I have used Every Word: Crossing on a previous Kindle.  I expected to use it on the HDX. However, after searching the Kindle website, I finally determined it was not compatible with the HDX. Subsequently, I purchase (it was free) the App Every Word - and received confirmation.  However, it was never delivered.  Your helpful tech determined that (again) it was not compatible with the HDX.  Not a crises - just a bit irritating.I have not yet used the Amazon Assist feature yet - but I think the offering is excellent.In one of the reviews I read before selecting the HDX, the reviewer commented that the On/Off button was in an awkward place - I agree.Thank you for the opportunity to comment.

Reviews.Title: Superb
Reviews.Author: H. S. Miller "insatiable reader"
Reviews.Content: I have gotten every 7" Fire as it came out.  All have been a pleasurable experience, but this HDX has exceeded all my expectations by far!  I was reluctant to get it as I only expected a software update and a few added gizmos.  I had hoped they would include another camera on it too, but no.What pushed me over the edge in purchasing it was a $50 coupon sent to me as a Prime customer, plus the knowledge I could sell my older HD Fire and recoup even more of the purchase price so it seemed to be worth a major software upgrade, all by itself.WOW!  Holy computational power, Batman!!!  I am more than delighted with this 7" HDX!  The total difference between the older Fire HD generation one and this Fire HDX is amazing!  Incredible value here!  My only regret is that it doesn't support Flash, but neither did the HD unless you sideloaded Dolphin, and for the most part I can do without having Flash on it.  I do hope a software upgrade will enable Flash videos on it, and soon, but with the outstanding performance and speed of the HDX as it is, I can live without having Flash.  Besides, what a lot of people don't realize is, if you use any other OS (in order to view Flash) rather than the Amazon version, you lose all the great benefits of Amazon's cloud loading and storage, which is part of the reason for it's speed and super flexibility.This HDX is a true world-beater.  I can't imagine what even newer models could provide in addition except another camera on the 7" model.  I have not used the Mayday help feature, but since I've used Fires from the very beginning I'm used to handling the OS.  I can see where the Mayday help feature could be absolutely invaluable to a beginning purchaser, though.  You get help on the spot and instantly.
